Title: Big Man in Tehran
Writer: Howard Gordon (developed for american television by), Alex Gansa (developed for american television by), Gideon Raff (based on the original Israeli series "Prisoners of War" by), Chip Johannessen, Patrick Harbinson
Actors: Claire Danes, Damian Lewis, Rupert Friend, Morena Baccarin
Plot: While Brody starts his mission in Tehran intending to kill the grand general of Iran, Carrie tries to give local support and a extraction plan for him.
